data.title: L'or233al Paris Elvive Extraordinary Clay Rebalancing Conditioner - 12.6 Fl Oz

qas.question: What do people think about  L'or233al Paris Elvive Extraordinary Clay Rebalancing Conditioner?

answers.text: I usually struggle with conditioner leaving my hair feeling oily but this conditioner does wonders. Will definitely be buying for myself!

paragraphs.context: I received this product complimentary to test out, but my opinions are my own. First I love the way it smells! It's also leaving my hair so soft and lightweight. I usually struggle with conditioner leaving my hair feeling oily but this conditioner does wonders. Will definitely be buying for myself! This review was collected as part of a promotion.

qas.question: Is L'or233al Paris Elvive Extraordinary Clay Rebalancing Conditioner worth buying?

answers.text: My hair feels so soft and smooth, my roots aren't oily, and my ends are looking a little healthier. I look forward to continuing to use this.

paragraphs.context: I got this for free to test out but my review and opinion is completely true and my own. This smells amazing for the first part, and it stays smelling even after your hair dries. My hair feels so soft and smooth, my roots aren't oily, and my ends are looking a little healthier. I look forward to continuing to use this. This review was collected as part of a promotion.

data.title: Almay Intense I-Color Liner, Black Pearl

qas.question: What do people think about  Almay Intense I-Color Liner ?

answers.text: It is so smooth and wears so much better.

paragraphs.context: Previously had only used liquid liner. Decided to try this. Lost the first one while traveling and then bought a Maybelline Unstoppable Eyeliner. I was so surprised at how bad that one was compared to the Almay Intense. I had to hurry and get another Almay Liner. It is so smooth and wears so much better.
